see how the pieces of the puzzle fit together.
The  law  was  somewhat  clearer  in  college  admissions.  As  Justice
O’Connor put it, “Since this Court’s splintered decision in Bakke,Justice
Powell’s  opinion  announcing  the  judgment  of  the  Court  has  served  as
the touchstone for constitutional analysis of race-conscious admissions
policies. Public and private universities across the nation have modelled
their own admissions programs on Justice Powel
